20101219141313.500|20101219141314.750|CCO|COLD CASES, THERE ARE NEW LEADS 
20101219141314.750|20101219141316.000|CCO|IN THE GRIM SLEEPER MURDER

20101219141317.250|20101219141318.500|CCO|RELEASED 180 IMAGES THURSDAY

20101219141319.750|20101219141321.000|CCO|>> WE HAVE ABOUT FIVE THAT WE 
20101219141321.000|20101219141322.429|CCO|HAVE TENTATIVELY I.D.'d, SO, YOU

20101219141333.857|20101219141335.286|CCO|LONNIE DAVID FRANKLIN JR., A
